tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_treatment_facilities (
 facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 facility_name TEXT NOT NULL,
 facility_type TEXT NOT NULL,
 capacity_kg INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE facility_types (
    facility_id INT,
    type_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES waste_facilities(facility_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (type_id) REFERENCES waste_types(type_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (facility_id, type_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection (
    collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id INT,
    collection_date DATE NOT NULL,
    collected_amount INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES waste_facilities(facility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteInventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    quantity DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES WasteFacilities(facility_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES WasteMaterials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollection (
    collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_date DATE,
    facility_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    quantity_collected DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES WasteFacilities(facility_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES WasteMaterials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteManagementPlans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
);
